name: Age of Currency
description:
The first game we have made for a game jam. Sadly we did not finish in time, there should be more "action" cards and an ending but we ran out of time.

Your life is Currency, so you trade your currencies and build your deck in order to reach more modern currencies. Drag your cards onto the traders to purchase the shown cards. When you pay enough the cards get added to your discard pile. Try to unlock modern currency! (The game does not have an ending, so there is not much to do after unlocking modern currency)

Art by Tjuvhder
Coding by Differenze

Thanks for playing!
